name: snappykraken
0:
”Alexa, ask snappy kraken to tell me about the company”
”Alexa, ask snappy kraken to tell me about the people of snappy kraken”
”Alexa, ask snappy kraken to play the latest update”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: snappy kraken
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Snappy Kraken provides marketing automation for financial advisers who care about meaningful connections. Learn more about the people behind the magic that moves cold to gold, and get real time voice updates, hands-free. Enable this skill then say, "Alexa, play the latest update from Snappy Kraken."

Other things you can ask (first say, "Alexa, open Snappy Kraken"):

"Tell me about the company."
"Tell me about the newest products."
"Tell me about the Marketing Campaigns."

Learn more: snappykraken.com
Follow us: @snappykraken

Request an invite to launch your own custom Alexa skill like this at WealthVoice.ai
